heading: HB00800
0: AN ACT EXPANDING THE JURISDICTION OF THE COURT OF APPEALS TO INCLUDE EXCLUSIVE APPELLATE JURISDICTION OVER ALL FINAL JUDGMENTS, RESOLUTIONS ORDER OR AWARDS OF THE HOUSING AND LAND USE REGULATORY BOARD (HLURB), AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 129, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980"
principal-authors: BATOCABE, RODEL M.; GARBIN, ALFREDO JR. A.; CO, CHRISTOPHER S.;
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00800
FULL TITLE : AN ACT EXPANDING THE JURISDICTION OF THE COURT OF APPEALS TO INCLUDE EXCLUSIVE APPELLATE JURISDICTION OVER ALL FINAL JUDGMENTS, RESOLUTIONS ORDER OR AWARDS OF THE HOUSING AND LAND USE REGULATORY BOARD (HLURB), AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 129, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980"
